Blog.post: wow last night i stayed up like all night with Ashley Lisa Lauren Cailin and this one girl i just met Laura. It was fun. I went home and i slept for like 4 hours.. sorry if im a little grumpy. My mom and i went to Olive garden. it was good. i wanted to go to mings but i changed my mind on the way there. Yeh it was good. Then i watched secret window.. ohh Johnny Depp is sooo hot, i mean for a 40 year old. lol. so yeh. Omg! mike and i got in another fight. and once again he blamed me. well yeh Mike it was all might fault and now im just feeling sorry for myself because i do that all the time.. Well how about this: i cut my wrist again! How would you feel then!?..well you lucky im not like that anymore. k i didnt mean that.. sorry this weeks been bad. Sorry Mike!!! lyl!

sorry i havent been writing in a while..yeh these past 3 days have been ok.i cant really remember what i did on the21ist or 22nd though..lol. But yesterday i had a swim meet. WE WON.. again. we're the best. Ha woot! but there was some pretty hot guys at the swim meet! XD! ha godfathers was so fun last night. my brothers hot friends asked me to get them a drink.. i hate it when people do that so i put lemonade in it and made it all taste nasty. Ha now they wont ask me to do it again. yeh so today Cassie and I are going to ride our bikes to jimmy johns, then laurens. because we have no life. i really dont know what else im gonna do. but ive been pretty busy this week. so yeh ..::+Bepp+::..

yesterday was awesomely awesome. i went to wal-mart for 3 hours to collect money for relay for life.. people were being mean and wouldnt give us money. did you know 1 in 3 people die of cancer? yep. Yeh Ashley and i were hungry so we bought fried chicken! it was yummy chicken too! Ha. yeh so i went home and then i went to famous daves with my daddy for Fathers day. it was nasty because i hate bbq. So yeh after that i went bowling with Laurel Laura and Alex. it was fun. Laura spent like all her money on food. i ate most of her nachos. they werent that good. lol. So we decided we were done bowling and we decided to walk to barnes and noble just to go. so we walked like a mile and we didnt even go in because her mom was going to pick us up at 8.30. So we just like walked in the door, looked around, and left. it was pretty funny. ew when we were walking there, we saw this truck and i think it ran over an animal or something because there was blood and weird fleshy stuff all over the wheel and it was dripping down the parking lot. nasty. Oh and then we went to krispy kreme!! i didnt get a doughbut though.. i wasnt in the mood. but i got a pimpin hat! yep. then we went to Lauras and we watched freaky friday. its such a good movie. we know all the lines because we're losers. Alex thinks we're weird. who cares! we are. so yeh then i went home and went to sleep. then i woke up at like 3.30 and i took a shower because i couldnt sleep. so yeh. i dont know what im doing today so yeh.

hello. today's gonna be a FUn day! wooooot. not. i have to babysit. i guess thats gonna be ok. but theres this party i dont wanna go to. but shhh dont tell. i'd rather jang out with Cass and Laurel. ha not Laura because she has to go to a party that she cant get out of. even if she tried.. like what im gonna do. i think its gonna work too! YES. + Yeh not a pretty fun day for bepp now is it? IM NOT GOING! YOU CANT TAKE ME ALIIIIIVE! hmmp. someone call me and have marvelous plans for from 5 to 9 that i just cant say no to! and neither can my momma. *i really like the song i dare you to move by switchfoot. -- Welcome to the planet Welcome to existence Everyone's here Everyone's here Everybody's watching you now Everybody waits for you now What happens next What happens next I dare you to move I dare you to move I dare you to lift yourself up off the floor I dare you to move I dare you to move Like today never happened Today never happened before Welcome to the fallout Welcome to resistance The tension is here Tension is here Between who you are and who you could be Between how it is and how it should be I dare you to move I dare you to move I dare you to lift yourself up off the floor I dare you to move I dare you to move Like today never happened Today never happened before Maybe redemption has stories to tell Maybe forgiveness is right where you fell Where can you run to escape from yourself? Where you gonna go? Where you gonna go? Salvation is here I dare you to move I dare you to move I dare you to lift yourself up off the floor I dare you to move I dare you to move Like today never happened Today never happened Today never happened Today never happened before PART II dood! i didnt go to the party!! ha ha. instead i went to Jewel with Ashley Lauren and Cassie to collect money for relay 4 life! it was wicked fun. OMg We had to go to the bathroom and when you flush the tolets it over flowed!! and there was already a turd in it.. and Cassie flushed it to test to see if it would flush because Ashley went in before and said someone didnt flush so she flushed and it over flowed.. well Cassie flushed the toilet and the turd spilled out!! oh it was nasty. Then Cassie and i went to Laurels. We went swimming!! ahh we're such dumbs! but it was extremely fun. but cold. very cold. i got a pretty manicure by the lovely Laurel. Woo you should see it. like BAM! ha ok well yeh. ++Bepp++

Yeh this morning i had to get up at like 6:30 to go to swim team. it was fun though because i dont like going to practice in the afternoon because i have better things to do. yeh.. wow summer is boring. this week has kinda been really boring. summer's actually been really boring. yeh so bleh..well i went to fiesta ranchera with Laura Laurel and Alex.. then we went back to Laura's and no offense but she being a buttox and just kept snapping at us and being mean.. im sorry but PMS isnt an excuse for being mean to you friends. So we left her and went to Laurels and Cassie came.. but we decided to forgive Laura and let her come over too. so we decided to watch along came polly. Thats an OK movie.. not one of my favorites. SO yeh.. no im home and im bored. WHY THE HELL IS NO ONE COMMENTING OR ANYTHING?!?! LOOK AT MY BLOG!!

today i woke up at Melissa's. KRISTINA WOKE ME UP! yeh.. i straightened Melissa's hair.. oh it was beautiful. Then i left Melissa's and went to subway with Cassie. we also went to wal-mart and had fun.. I went to swim team today.. yeh it was fun i mean.. for swimteam that is. WHOA have you ever tried those kool-aid icey cool crap... its freakin weird.. but delicious. OMggggg i really like this one guy.. yep. ok so yeh.. im borerered. Quote: "theres no such thing as fun for the whole family." -Jerry Sienfeld. ahhh im so bored. im putting gay quotes in this thing!!! Laura is BAAAAAAck. woo! the james bond song is in my head...

today.. was a fun day. I GOT A BLOG! wheeeeee. yeh nothing happened today. all i did was sleep and talk to people online. Later tonight im going to Melissa's with krissy for a sleep over. i hope i dont have to go to swim team.. well right now im going over to cassies.. so yeh. thanks for reading my blogggg.
